testcase.name: Using Reading external csv file
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx/CelsiusToFahrenheit" . passed And header Content-Type = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ............. passed And request "Celsius=40" .................................................. passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * match response //string == "104" ........................................ passed
